column4: Hey, i just installed ubuntu server 11.04 with lamp.. Now i want to install a gui and the help thing says 'First you nee to make sure you have enabled Universe and multiverse repositories in /etc/apt/sources.list file'... how do i do that?
i can use the comands but it failes to fetch data
why not just install ubuntu desktop
if i do that can i still install all the stuff i need for phpmyadmin and have sql databases and all that stuff?
id assume so yes
is it going to be your desktop too?
can you ping 74.125.39.147
what does ifconfig show?
it should say your local ip like 192.168 etc
do you use dhcp? if not then youll need to manually set an address
yes you can change it to static
yes
press esc to exit insert mode, then type :x
or use nano, its just ctrl+x with nano
did you reoot?
you can bring up / down the net interface but i just reboot after changes
maybe you did the net config wrong? does lspci show the network card?
theres no lo in there
can you ping the router?
is your cable plugged in? lol
is this on the server? can you paste the ifconfig -a
